abstract: The campaign of Gov. Rick Perry found itself on the defensive on Sunday over a report that he once hunted at a West Texas camp with a racially charged name.
snippet: The campaign of Gov. Rick Perry found itself on the defensive on Sunday over a report that he once hunted at a West Texas camp with a racially charged name.
lead_paragraph: The campaign of Gov. Rick Perry of Texas found itself on the defensive on Sunday over a report that he once hunted at a West Texas camp with a racially charged name.

headline.main: Texas Hunting Camp's Name Causes Trouble for Perry
